about_the_game:
Degenerates is an action-packed, Virtual Reality superhero game. Take control of 3 different super-heroes each with their own unique set of powers: Earth, Telekinesis, and Electricity. Fight off waves of enemies in large combat arenas featuring destructible environments and epic boss fights.



After being deemed a threat to society, a group of young metahumans are detained in a government research lab for people with superpowers. There they are forced to use their powers to fight for survival.

GAME PLAY MECHANICS

  • Shoot, block, and parry enemy projectiles to build power
  • Slow down time to dodge out of the way of enemy attacks
  • Perform special attacks to deal powerful damage
  • Juggle airborne enemies to extend combos and maintain power

FEATURES

  • Physics driven combat system
  • Explosive particle effects
  • Destructible environments
  • Diverse biomes and arenas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 2m area required
  • Additional Notes: Valve Index controller recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 2m area required
  • Additional Notes: Valve Index controller recommended
